node.name: Whitney Deterding

customFields.bylinebio:
Whitney Deterding has 10+ years of experience in marketing with a focus on developing digital marketing strategies, managing marketing projects, and researching best practices for result-driven marketing. 

At CoSchedule, Whitney strategizes growth opportunities, develop's product positioning, and creates new research-based processes for the marketing team. Whitney also works on building cohesive branding across all internal departments. 

Whitney focuses on delivering value to the customers, growing the brand's identity, and increasing customer retention rates. She’s passionate about diving into data and developing new practices to grow the company. 

One of her main responsibilities is developing strategies for landing pages, emails, social posts, advertisements, promotions, product announcements, newsletters, website content, and everything else in between. Throughout this, she ensures that the company's messaging and positioning are aligned with customer needs.

node.description: Whitney is a Product Marketing Strategy Lead at CoSchedule. With over 10+ years of experience in marketing, she enjoys helping other marketers transform the way they work with CoSchedule products. In her spare time, she can be found volunteering, coaching figure skating, and spending time with her family.

post.content:
Join CoSchedule’s affiliate program to promote the products you use & love while earning 20% commission for every marketer you refer! Become A CoSchedule Affiliate Do you use & love CoSchedule’s Marketing Calendar, Marketing Suite, and/or Headline Studio products? Now you can make money by referring marketers to CoSchedule!

1. Sign up for CoSchedule’s affiliate program.

It doesn’t matter if you’re new to affiliate marketing or a total pro. Anyone can join CoSchedule’s affiliate program. To be a successful affiliate, all you need is:
  • A desire to help marketers, bloggers, & other creatives achieve more success.
  • An audience who can benefit from content marketing, marketing calendar, and/or marketing work management software.
To get started, join our affiliate program on ShareASale. We will manually review & approve all affiliates, so it can take up to 48 hours before you get approved. Join Our Affiliate Program
IMPORTANT: Make sure you read our Affiliate Terms of Service.

2. Share CoSchedule products with your audience.

Once approved, you can start earning commission! All you have to do is share your unique referral link with your customers, followers, fans, & friends. We want you to be a successful affiliate, so we’ve created a library of resources you can use to promote your favorite CoSchedule products, including:
  • Graphics, banner ads, & screenshots of CoSchedule’s products: Marketing Calendar, Marketing Suite, & Headline Studio.
  • Videos you can share in blog posts, social messages, emails, & other content.
  • A personalized dashboard in ShareASale to track your progress & access new assets.

3. Earn Money $$$

Start earning commissions for recommending CoSchedule’s industry-leading marketing solutions.
  • 90-day Cookie - Get rewarded for any visitor who clicks your affiliate link & purchases within 90 days.
  • 20% Commission - share your referral link to earn 20% of every referred sale!
Best of all, you’ll get a personalized affiliate dashboard, so you can stay up to date with how much you’ve earned!
Join Us In Helping Marketers Do Better Work In Less Time as a CoSchedule Affiliate.
Through our affiliate program, you’re not just earning money for your bank account. You’re helping marketers like you:
  • Organize all of their marketing in one place with Marketing Calendar & Marketing Suite
  • Create a real-time marketing calendar that helps them see the big picture in a glance with Marketing Calendar
  • Easily coordinate their team, projects, & process with CoSchedule Marketing Suite
  • Drive more traffic to their website & blog by using Headline Studio to improve their headlines
  • Improve SEO with data-driven keyword research & competitor analysis found in Headline Studio
  • And so much more!
Become A CoSchedule Affiliate Thank you for choosing CoSchedule’s affiliate program. If you have any questions, please contact us at affiliate@coschedule.com
